issue.title: [C#][Flight] .NET Standard 2.0 target
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-15381](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-15381). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Newer versions of Grpc for .NET support .NET Standard 2.0, which allows one to use it from .NET Framework. The linked PR updates the projects and adds netstandard2.0 as a target framework for `Arrow.Flight`.

https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/12193
